doc:
Derek Farr https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Derek_Farr 0 Derrick Capel Farr (7 February 1912, Brentford, Middlesex – 22 March 1986, Hillingdon, Middlesex) was an English actor who appeared regularly in British films and television from 1938 until his death in 1986. His more famous roles include Group Captain John Whitworth in The Dam Busters. Derrick_Capel_Farr ( 7_February_1912 , Brentford , Middlesex – 22_March_1986_,_Hillingdon_,_Middlesex ) was an_English_actor who appeared regularly in British_films_and_television from 1938 until his_death in 1986 . His_more_famous_roles include Group_Captain_John_Whitworth in The_Dam_Busters .
